thread.section_title: Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Value
thread.title_full: Good Value - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Benjamin K
title: Good Value
text: Very Nice hotel and what you would expect from an upmarket Marriott. There are 2 different Metro lines within a couple of hundred yards. You can also walk to the Louvre and other landmarks in about 10 min. We had 2 rooms and both of them were to hot (about 90 deg). We turned down the heat all the way and they were still a little toasty so we opened the windows and that did the trick. Beds and pillows where acceptable and everything was clean. All the staff where very friendly and helpful including the cleaning staff. Also there was enough shopping to satisfy my wife and daughter within 200 yards of the hotel. All in all we were very satisfied with this hotel and would book here again.
